participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

MOCA_01.Description: Visuospatial and Executive subscore includes: Trails Switching, Cube Copy, Draw Clock, range 0-5

MOCA_02.Description: Visual confrontation naming subscore includes pictured: lion, rhinocerous, camel/dromedary, range 0-3

MOCA_03.Description: MEMORY for 5 nouns immediate recall of 1st trial, range 0-5

MOCA_04.Description: MEMORY for 5 nouns immediate recall of 2nd trial, range 0-5

MOCA_05.Description: Forward and backward digit repetition, range 0-2

MOCA_06.Description: Auditory monitoring for letter “A” in letter string, range 0-1

MOCA_09.Description: Name words beginning with F for 1 minute, range 0-1

MOCA_10.Description: Describe how two things are alike, range 0-2

MOCA_11.Description: 5 minute word memory recall of 5 nouns, range 0-5

MOCA_12.Description: Identify date, month, year, day , place, city, range 0-6

MOCA_13.Description: Total Score unadjusted for education, range 0-30

MOCA_14.Description:
Total Score adjusted for education, plus 1 point if high school or less, range 0-30
Please note that the maximum score is 30, therefore, if a subject scores 30/30, a point is not added if he/she has 12 years of education or less.
